channel.title: AWS on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: AWS S3
item.description: The AWS S3 Integration is a Self-Service integration that can be configured on a CDS Project. With this integration, you can use a dedicated AWS S3 Bucket Storage on : action Artifact Upload action Artifact Download worker cache command Notice: by default, the storage is configured in CDS Configuration. This integration allows user to use their own AWS S3 Storage and not use the shared storage. Configure with WebUI You can add a AWS S3 on your CDS Project.
